messages.subject: [NHEN-SpeakOut] Homeschooling in the News 3/24/01
messages.msgSnippet: March 24 Associated Press : California parents seeking alternatives http://www.newsday.com/ap/national/ap328.htm Parents consider homeschooling in the wake of
messages.messageBody:
March 24
Associated Press : California parents seeking alternatives
http://www.newsday.com/ap/national/ap328.htm
Parents consider homeschooling in the wake of California school shootings.

March 23
Daily Herald-Tribune : Home schooling growing in popularity
http://www.bowesnet.com/dht/Z02_2303home.html
Brief but nice article about homeschooling and a local conference.

March 21
Montgomery Advertiser : Teen-age group brings faith to Capitol
http://www.accessmontgomery.com/1news/stategov/032101_pact.htm
A group of homeschooled Christian teens visits the state capitol.

Minor mentions:

March 24
Pittsburgh Post-Gazette : Regional science fair winners
http://www.post-gazette.com/regionstate/20010324sciencefair8.asp

Boston Globe : Beck sees the light
http://www.boston.com:80/dailyglobe2/083/sports/Beck_sees_the_light+.shtml

March 19
Topeka Capital-Journal : Spellers make bee
http://cjonline.com/stories/032001/kan_spellingbee20.shtml

Laura Derrick
National Home Education Network
http://www.nhen.org
